Game.Name: Twin Series 4 - Hamu Hamu Monster EX - Hamster Monogatari RPG + Fantasy Puzzle - Hamster Monogatari - Mahou no Meikyuu 1.2.3 (Japan)
Game.plot: Twin Series Vol. 4: Ham Ham Monster EX/Fantasy Puzzle Hamster Monogatari is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Culture Brain,which was released in Japan in 2004.
